quality_assessment: Good - Comprehensive coverage with excellent examples. Only minor gaps exist (ClaudeMessage event type, correlation ID examples).

issues.description: ClaudeMessage event type is not documented
issues.fix_suggestion: Add ClaudeMessage event type to Event Types section with JSON example showing agent_id, content, message_type, and json_log_location fields

issues.description: Correlation IDs mentioned in features but not demonstrated in examples
issues.fix_suggestion: Add example showing how to use correlation_id field in events for tracing related operations across multiple agents

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all three mapped observability features
Excellent practical examples throughout the page
Clear progression from basics to advanced usage
Good debugging workflow examples for MapReduce failures
Cross-references to related pages are valid and appropriate
Includes performance metrics section with token usage and timing
Log management section with cleanup examples
Event query examples show real-world usage patterns
Verbosity control documentation is complete and accurate
improvement_suggestions: Add ClaudeMessage event type documentation with example JSON structure
Include correlation ID usage examples in event query section
Add troubleshooting subsection for common observability issues
Consider adding comparison table of all event types with their purposes
Add example of filtering events by correlation ID to trace a specific workflow

metadata.validation_focus: Check event logging, Claude log tracking, and verbosity settings are documented
